"Oh, why hello there Kagome. How are you doing?" said Kagura, slyly.

"Kagura! Where is Inuyasha??!?" Kagome stammered.

"I don't think you're in a position to be worrying about anyone else." Kagura smiled.

"Let me out of here Kagura!" Kagome said, in a panic.

"But Kagome, the fun is just beginning." Kagura said as she inched towards Kagome.

"Wh... What do you mean?!?" Kagome stuttered.

"Don't worry, we have plenty of time to talk. Kagome, I've always wondered, where did you get these silly little clogs anyway?" Kagura asked as she slowly removed Kagome's shoes.

"What do you think you're doing Kagura?!" Kagome was worried.

"My my, these are some thick socks you have on. I've heard a little rumor about human's and their weaknesses. I hear that there is a way to break a person mentally, by exploiting them physically. The rumor I speak of ... say ... what would happen if i were to run my nail along your sock here?

"What? What are you doing? Scratching my leg? Stop that's annoying." Kagome said, worried for what was in store.

"Hmm? Was the rumor wrong?" Kagura said as she moved her fingers from Kagome's shins down to her ankles.

Kagome flinched.

"Hmm?" Kagura said as her fingers approached Kagome's sole.

Kagome flinched again.

"Oh i see, is it only the bottom of the foot that is sensitive to this treatment? So ... what if I do this?" Kagura slowly moved her finger along the bottom of Kagome's left socked sole, moving upward towards the ball of her foot.

"Hggmmph. Kagura stop. Human's aren't affected by anything like that." said Kagome, hoping to convince Kagura to stop.

"Oh really?" asked Kagura, as her fingers rolled over the ball of Kagome's foot, in circles, under her big toe.

"hihh hmmph." Kagome bit her lip. Inuyasha was probably in trouble. She had to find a way out of here. But she didn't even know where she was.

"My my, these thick socks are like a shield for your feet aren't they?" Kagura inquired curiously.

123.content:
"Where am I? What's going on here?!" Sango thought aloud as she regained consciousness. She attempted to move but was held back by some type of bondage. Sango raised her head as far back as she could and noticed rope tied around her wrists, tightly; whoever had done this was good. Sango began to access her surroundings as best she could with the dim lighting. The floor was hard, as were the walls, and she determined she was in some kind of basement, beneath the ground as far as she could tell. And it was quiet, a very unnerving lack of sound of all but her breathing and the shuffling of the rope and her body against the wall. Sango realized that someone had removed her kimono and she was now in only her slayer outfit, with her hair tied back neatly.

A creak from the ceiling showered in light from above, and she realized she was in fact in a cellar. Sango heard someone walking calmly down wooden stairs, and heading toward where she was tied. Sango's first instinct was to observe and be cautious to see if they posed a threat. She couldn't tell if it was a demon or human yet. Maybe this was all just a misunderstanding. Maybe it was a mistake. She'd easily straighten things out. The opening of light slammed shut and footsteps approached her slowly.

"Who's there?" She questioned cautiously. The figure lit a few candles nearby and allowed a bit of the light to shine on their face.
123.title: Sango Awakens

1233.title: Other

info.brief_description: Kagome, and Sango end up in a land were tickling is the name of the game
info.description: Kagome, and Sango (from Inuyasha) awaken to find themselves in a strange place called tickleland, where tickling is everything. You decide what happens. Just remember that this is primarily a tickling story, so try to keep it that way. Also no guy/guy tickling. That being said have fun.
